TechnoTypeClass *  pItem 
) [static] 

00095 {
00096         int BuildLimit = pItem->BuildLimit;
00097         if(BuildLimit >= 0) {
00098                 return BuildLimit > pHouse->CountOwnedNow(pItem);
00099         } else {
00100                 return abs(BuildLimit) > pHouse->CountOwnedEver(pItem);
00101         }

00087                 if(Remaining <= 0 && IncludeQueued) {

00089                 }
00090         }
00091         return Remaining > 0;
